hangle: 모두들 도망가는 와중에 혼자서 저렇게 용기를 내다니.
first_translate: she’s so courageous for standing up all by herself when everyone else ran off...
the monsters will come after us soon!
m-miss, may I ask your name...?
thank you for saving me, lady fiona...
in fact, she got this name because of me.

hangle: 죄송합니다! 바로 치료한 뒤 자리를 옮겨 드릴게요!
first_translate: I apologize! let me treat you first and then move you somewhere safe!

hangle: 제가 지켜 줄테니, 주변은 신경 쓰지 말고 환자들을 어서 치료하도록 해요.
first_translate: I’ll protect you from any danger, so focus only on treating them as quickly as possible.
there seem to be more patients over there.

hangle: 사실 영애에 대해 묻고 싶은 건 많지만…
first_translate: to tell you the truth, I have lots of questions regarding you, but...

hangle: 유니스를 호위하며 마물을 해치우길 몇 번.
first_translate: while protecting eunice, I killed several monsters.
no matter how many we defeat, there are just too many!

hangle: 아까 기사가 말해준 걸 듣자하니 황실의 지원을 기대하기도 힘들 것 같은데…
first_translate: from what the knight said earlier, it seems like we can’t expect help from the palace anytime soon...
we did send someone to inform the royal family,

hangle: 거리나 준비 문제로 즉시 오기는 힘들다고 합니다!
first_translate: but they won’t make it immediately due to distance and preparation time!
not to mention those dark clouds gathering above our heads.

hangle: 비가 오면 사람은 체온이 식어서 몸도 둔해지고 시야도 방해받아.
first_translate: when rain falls, humans lose body heat, become slower, and their vision gets obstructed.

hangle: 반면 마물은 거의 영향을 받지 않겠지.
first_translate: on the other hand, these monsters probably aren’t affected at all.
let’s think while fighting the monsters!
do they fear fire or something...?

hangle: 확실히 저 마물은 변형되기 전에는 불이 약점이던 개체였지.
first_translate: before its transformation, fire used to be one of its weaknesses.

hangle: 겉이 아무리 강해졌어도, 생존에 대한 본능적인 부분은 아직 남아 있을지도 몰라.
first_translate: despite having stronger bodies, perhaps some part of their instincts still remain intact.
most of the monsters were wolf-like creatures...
this could work to our advantage...
isn’t this supposed to be where the two main characters fall in love?!
that’s it?! why didn’t anything happen?!

hangle: 그치만 아쉬운 가운데 어쩐지 조금 기쁜 기분도 들어.
first_translate: I am disappointed, but somehow I also feel happy.
you’re thinking weird things again, aren’t you?

hangle: 이상한 생각은 생각은 아니지만, 좋은 생각은 있어.
first_translate: not exactly “weird,” but I do have good ideas sometimes.

hangle: 생각해 보니까 마물을 굳이 다 죽일 필요는 없잖아?
first_translate: now that I think about it, maybe we don’t need to kill every single monster.
all we really want is to keep the villagers safe.

hangle: 아무리 너랑 공작님의 솜씨가 훌륭해도 사람들을 전부 보호할 순 없고.
first_translate: no matter how skilled you and his grace are, you both can’t possibly protect everyone.

hangle: 그러니 그냥 쫓아내기만 해도 괜찮을 거 아니야.
first_translate: so wouldn’t chasing them away suffice?

hangle: 마물들은 육체적인 능력에 비해 지능이 그렇게 높진 않아.
first_translate: monsters lack intelligence compared to their physical abilities.

hangle: 이제는 통하지 않을게 분명한 약한 불꽃도 꺼리지.
first_translate: if even weak flames scare them, imagine if we use bigger ones.

hangle: 경험이 풍부한 네가 그렇게 판단했다면, 그게 옳겠지.
first_translate: if you say so, I trust your judgment since you have experience dealing with such situations.

hangle: 이곳을 아주 큰 횃불로 만들어 버리자!
first_translate: let’s turn this place into a giant torch!

hangle: 이 마법을 피오나 영애가 시전하셨다고 들었는데,
first_translate: I heard that lady fiona cast this spell,
but apparently, lady fiona has overwhelming powers.
how does she stand so proudly amidst the flames...?
any human would burn to death under normal circumstances,
sometimes people reject what is different,
yet paradoxically feel drawn to it.

hangle: 긴 은발과 함께 휘날리는 주홍빛 불티,
first_translate: with long silver hair swaying alongside crimson sparks,

hangle: 그러나 머리카락 한 올 조차 타지않는
first_translate: not a strand of her hair caught fire.

hangle: 이 자리에 있던 사람들은 훗날 이렇게 회상한다.
first_translate: years later, the witnesses recalled this moment.

hangle: 타오르는 불꽃이 머리카락에 보석처럼 장식되던 그 광경은,
first_translate: as the blazing flames adorned her locks like jewels,
yet mesmerizing enough to instill fear within themselves.
that person is none other than fiona halyon!
